keyMoments.title: Using Impact Dial for Escape
keyMoments.description: The crew works together to use the Impact Dial from Skypiea to launch the Going Merry upward from the grounded harbor floor.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to work as a team and creatively use resources from previous adventures.

keyMoments.title: Successful Escape from G-8
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully escape from the heavily fortified G-8 Marine Base using the Octopus Balloon, marking the end of the G-8 Arc.
keyMoments.significance: Concludes the longest anime-original arc and demonstrates the crew's growth in problem-solving and teamwork without relying solely on combat.

flagDescription: A skull with a straw hat
